title: 89 Novels by Sara Craven
description:
Sara Craven is a popular British author of over 80 romance novels. Her novels have been published by Mills & Boon ever since 1975. In 2010 she became chairman of the Southern Writers' Conference, and the next year was elected the twenty-six Chairman (2011Ã¢â‚¬â€œ2013) of the Romantic Novelists' Association.

Genre: Contemporary Romance
